ygData.subject: Re: Gestalts
ygData.msgSnippet: The new transformer looks at Prowl, something about his name makes him think. It s good to see you again Prowl, the name s Optimal Prime, I use to be Optimus

The new transformer looks at Prowl, something about his name makes him 
think. "It's good to see you again Prowl, the name's Optimal Prime, I use to 
be Optimus Prime but I was rebuilt like this after a transwarp explosion. 
The wave even affected the matrix shell. And just so you know, I'm still an 
Autobot," he informs Prowl.


>From: Yanshosh@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: Gestalts
>Date: Thu, 26 Apr 2001 20:58:03 -0000
>
>::Prowl::
>
>Prowl looks up as a transformer arrives out of the sky, hoping that it
>wasn't another enemy. He flies up to him.
>
>"Hello, I'm Prowl. Are you Maximal or Predacon?" he says, ready to
>react incase the answer is the latter.
>
>
>
>--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Scorpius (No last name)" <scorpiusis@h...> wrote:
> > Suddenly, out of nowhere some sort of wormhole opened in the sky,
>and out of
> > it came some sort of ship, it transformed into a robot and landed.
>The new
> > transformer was tall, it had the body of Optimal Optimus, but its
>colors
> > were that of Optimus Prime, instead of a mouth it had a face plate,
>and on
> > it's shoulders were autobot insignias.
> >
> >
> > >From: "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...>
> > >Reply-To: nbwrpg@y...

> > >::Surgital::
> > >
> > >       Surgital avoided the first bolt but the second hit him in
>the chest.
> > >  He gasped in pain as the electric shock surged through his body.
> > >Surgital attempted to fire a large energon net from his knee at
>Lavatron,
> > >to at least have him caught up for a moment.
> > >   ----- Original Message -----
> > >   From: Yanshosh@a...
> > >   To: nbwrpg@y...
> > >   Sent: Thursday, April 26, 2001 11:25 AM

> > >
> > >   ::Lavatron::
> > >
> > >   Lavatron jumped back to avoid the blade, and launched two more
>bolts
> > >   at Surgital's chest. The ground shook as he stepped back a few
>times
> > >   to keep his balance after avioding the blade.
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> > >   > ::Abominus/Surgital::
> > >   >
> > >   >     Abominus moved a little, but was still hit in the head and
> > >   chest by the missiles.  He stumbled back quite far actually, 5
>steps
> > >   is kinda far for a gestalt to stumble back from a normal
>heighted
> > >   warrior's perspective.  Abominus snarled meanly at Galaxor, then
> > >   fired 2 beams from the lazer from his lower chest.
> > >   > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > >   >        Surgital heard the lightning bolt, and quickly turned
>around
> > >   and side-stepped just in time to avoid the lightning bolt by a
>speck
> > >   or two.  Then, Surgital converted his hand into a saw blade
>again,
> > >   and this time shot the saw blade at Lavatron's head.  (BTW, the
>blade

>of
> > >   dodging it.)
